review_data.title: Schönes neues Cafe
review_data.content: Tolle Quartierbäckerei, hell und neu eingerichtet, freundliches Personal, guter Kaffee und leckeres Essen (nebst Salaten, Sandwich auch Mittagsmenu). Gut geeignet...More

review_data.title: Surprisingly good
review_data.content: We cycled past this newly build part of town, and noticed this bakery. we stopped off and sat on the terrace (pity that's in the shade). The selection of cakes and biscuits was good, and tasted fresh. The coffee was prepared fresh and is served...More

review_data.title: Frische Brötchen
review_data.content: Eine Bäckerei eingebettet in die neue Wohnsiedlung. Diese bringt etwas Leben in die noch sehr kahle Siedlung hinein. Grosse Auswahl...More

review_data.title: Local bakery and decent coffee
review_data.content: We stumbled upon this place on a Sunday morning and it was a pleasant surprise. It’s a little hidden but when inside it’s very relaxing. Really lovely people there too.

review_data.title: Quality, fresh baked goods
review_data.content: The Gewobag Quartier Beck, has three locations around the city. I just finished visiting their latest café, Café Mattenhof, which is within a massive and brand new residential housing complex close to Stettbach Bahnhof. The place has a nice courtyard seating area. Inside, there about...More
